signal_id.description: Unique signal identifier (UUID or timestamp-based). Used for audit trail - links to OrderEvent.intent_id.

timestamp.description: Signal generation timestamp (UTC RFC3339 with Z suffix).

strategy_id.description: Unique identifier of the strategy that generated this signal (e.g., 'buy_and_hold', 'sma_crossover').

symbol.description: Instrument identifier for which the signal applies (e.g., AAPL, BTC-USD).

intention.description: Trading intention - what action the strategy recommends.

price.description: Price at which the signal was generated / action should be taken as decimal string. Typically the current market price when signal generated.

confidence.description: Signal confidence level as decimal string [0.0, 1.0]. Higher = stronger conviction.

reason.description: Human-readable explanation of why this signal was generated (e.g., 'SMA crossover detected', 'First bar - entering position').

metadata.description: Optional strategy-specific metadata (e.g., indicator values, scores, debug info). Schema-free JSON object.

stop_loss.description: Optional stop loss price as decimal string. If provided, position should be closed if price reaches this level.

take_profit.description: Optional take profit price as decimal string. If provided, position should be closed if price reaches this level.
